pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Mayor of Halifax Mike Savage | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with Mayor of Halifax Mike Savage to offer his congratulations to the Mayor on being elected by Haligonians for a third term.  

The Prime Minister and the Mayor also discussed the success of the Atlantic bubble. Prime Minister Trudeau restated his commitment to helping municipalities, provinces, and territories respond to the global COVID-19 pandemic and ensuring economic recovery. Prime Minister Trudeau and Mayor Savage also discussed the Rapid Housing Initiative, which will help address urgent housing needs of vulnerable Canadians by rapidly creating new affordable housing.

The Prime Minister and the Mayor agreed on the importance of continuing to work together on the response to COVID-19, in order to protect the health and safety of the people of Halifax, and all Canadians.
